Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 1
(HEALTH UNIT MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2.07 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR MAINTAINING A HEALTH UNIT AND OTHER MISCELLANEOUS EXPENSES INCURRED IN THE OPERATION OF THIS UNIT.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Grant, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of two and seven hundredths (2.07) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $68,256 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining a Health Unit and other miscellaneous expenses incurred in the operation of this unit?

Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 2
(COURTHOUSE & JAIL MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 3.22 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR MAINTAINING THE PARISH COURTHOUSE, COURTHOUSE ANNEX AND JAIL.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Grant, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of three and twenty-two hundredths (3.22) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $106,176 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of maintaining the Parish Courthouse, Courthouse Annex and Jail?

Race.SummaryText:
PROPOSITION NO. 3
(ROADS & BRIDGES MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 8.61 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, REPAIRING AND MAINTAINING PUBLIC ROADS AND BRIDGES.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Grant, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of eight and sixty-one hundredths (8.61) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $283,906 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing, improving, repairing and maintaining public roads and bridges, title to which shall be in public?

Race.SpecificTitle: Recreation Dist. No. 2 -- 2.65 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
RECREATION DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE CONTINUATION & REDEDICATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2.65 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION AND REDEDICATION FOR CONSTRUCTING, ACQUIRING, IMPROVING, OPERATING AND/OR MAINTAINING RECREATION FACILITIES, EQUIPMENT AND PROGRAMS IN THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Recreation District No. 2 of Grant Parish, Louisiana (the "District") continue to levy a special tax of two and sixty-five hundredths (2.65) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $12,129 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, with the proceeds of the Tax heretofore or hereafter collected, to be rededicated and used for the purpose of constructing, acquiring, improving, operating and/or maintaining recreation facilities, equipment and programs in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist.No.1 -- 16.53 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. ONE PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 16.53 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR PURCHASING AND MAINTAINING EQUIPMENT AND THE GENERAL OPERATIONS OF FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. ONE.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. One of Grant Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of sixteen and fifty-three hundredths (16.53) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $153,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2007 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of purchasing and maintaining equipment, and the general operations of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire District No. Four -- 10 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. FOUR PROPOSITION
(MILLAGE RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 10 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR PURCHASING AND MAINTAINING EQUIPMENT FOR USE IN THE OPERATION OF THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. Four of Grant Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $14,142 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of purchasing and maintaining equipment for use in the operation of the District?
